mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_zs_school_major LEFT JOIN t_info_school ON t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_school = t_info_school.school_id LEFT JOIN t_geo_province ON t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_province = t_geo_province.province_code LEFT JOIN t_info_zslx ON t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_zslx = t_info_zslx.zslx_code LEFT JOIN t_info_pc ON t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_pc = t_info_pc.pc_code LEFT JOIN t_school_major ON t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_major = t_school_major.school_major_code WHERE t_zs_school_major.zs_school_major_school = #{schoolId}
